R

RandomEvent - Class in events
An abstract base class for random events that players can encounter when moving between islands.

removeAllCargo() - Method in class ships.Ship
Removes all the cargo from the ship, and returning it.

Deduct money from the balance.

Takes an upgrade, and removes the first upgrade of its type in the upgrade pool

Deducts the player's money after taking damage
